review: as far as i am concerned, mangal pandey fails to live upto the expectations. the movie with its excessive exposure of female anatomy and a weak display of the seriousness of the situation does not prove to be intense or touching. the movie would have been much more nail-biting and at the same time, inspiring, if only the gravity of the circumstances had been given a little more importance than mere entertainment. a poor show by amir khan and ketan mehta, surprisingly, when both of are considered icons in the world of indian cinema.
